incidents.title: MAL Sync
incidents.content: MyAnimeList has added a Captcha to their login form and our sync is no longer working. We are working to move it over to their new API, but until then it will be down.

incidents.title: Moving To New Servers
incidents.content: We're moving Kitsu to new servers! We should be back online shortly, and if you have any questions you can talk to us on our Discord in #tech-support!

incidents.title: Kitsu Unavailable
incidents.content:
Due to an error, Kitsu is currently unavailable. We are actively working to restore access, and we ask for your patience.

2021-01-08T20:17:11.000Z
Recovering

We've restored access to Kitsu but our servers are still recovering and catching up, so the site may be slow for now.

2021-01-08T20:48:34.000Z
Resolved

Performance has recovered to normal levels and the site should be operating normally now.

incidents.title: Search Outage
incidents.content:
Our quick search is currently unavailable. Advanced search for anime & manga is unaffected by this outage.

2020-11-15T00:09:32.000Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.

incidents.title: Feed & Notifications Delayed
incidents.content:
Posts and notifications are not appearing on user feeds.

Posts are not being lost and will appear in user feeds when once the post queue has decreased. Comments and likes are not affected by this.

2020-08-17T14:38:07.000Z
Monitoring

We are investigating the cause of this incident.

2020-08-17T16:02:09.000Z
Update

There is an issue with our worker services that handle feed posts and notifications that are preventing them from being sent to users.

2020-08-17T16:48:26.000Z
Mitigated

The issue has been remediated and the queue for delivering posts and comments are going down. We are continuing to monitor for any futher issues.

2020-08-17T17:05:19.000Z
Resolved

This incident has been resolved.

incidents.title: DNS Outage
incidents.content:
Our domain auto-renewal payment was rejected by PayPal.

2020-08-10T19:20:00.000Z
Resolved

We have approved the rejected payment. Service may remain degraded for several hours while the DNS records re-propogate.
